events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision on a busy highway.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident as it involves a vehicle collision incident.
An agent with experience in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer.
Acknowledged the claim to the customer, confirming the receipt of the accident report.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and driver’s license copies from the claimant.
Received all requested documents including photos and official accident report from the customer.
Investigation initiated to verify the circumstances of the vehicle collision and damages claimed.
Completed the investigation confirming the collision details and damages are consistent with claim.
Proposed settlement amount to the claimant based on the repair estimates and insurance policy.
Received customer feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and support.
Claim approved officially, allowing the next steps for repair and payment processing.
Issued payment to customer’s repair service provider as per approved claim settlement.
Closed the claim file after all payments were processed and repair work confirmed completed.
